text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 200 of 262 1911 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross

(Jury present) THE COURT: Everyone may be seated. Thank you, members of the jury. Mr. Everdell, you may continue with your cross examination. Mr. Rodgers, I remind you, you are under oath. You may inquire. MR. EVERDELL: Thank you, your Honor. BY MR. EVERDELL: Q. Welcome back, Mr. Rodgers. A. Thank you. Q. You were asked a lot of questions by the government on direct examination about a woman that we are referring to as Jane. Do you recall that? A. Yes. Q. To be clear, Jane is not her real name, her real first name; correct? A. Correct. Q. But you do know what her name is, her real name? THE COURT: Without saying it. Q. Without saying it? A. Yes. Q. Now, you say you recall seeing Jane on Epstein's plane; right? A. Yes.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
